attributes.additional_details: Schools should not have more authority than the parents and they feel they do because the government has made to many things acceptable for them, which leaves parents feeling hopeless in unfair decisions, they do not think about the childs mental health nor do they think about the parents aniexty, too many planned attacks and killings and kidnaps are happening around us.
attributes.background: Giving children after school detentions puts them at risk of harm from predators, it makes more sense to give children detentions during school hours not after school when they are due to be back home.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/629938
